summary: REQ-1 is partially implemented: LIVE_VERSION and LIVE_VERSION_DATE were updated in the single source of truth file, but evidence suggests at least one UI location may still display a hardcoded “Draft 32” (App.tsx footer), which would violate the acceptance criteria. Additionally, two non-requested meta/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: After building the frontend, any UI location that displays the live/draft version shows Draft 34 (no remaining Draft 32 references used for live version display).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff evidence indicates the app footer still displays “Draft 32”, suggesting the UI may not be fully driven by the updated liveVersion.ts constants or still contains a live-version hardcode.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified project tracking metadata (project_state.json) including new_feature_requests entries and status fields.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the live version identifier in frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts; it did not request changes to project state metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt content describing extensive Tambola/voice/UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids introducing new features beyond updating the published draft version identifier; updating this summary file is not requested and references unrelated feature work.
